sentences: Ta ei luba lapsed vaadata televisiooni.
context: The Estonian verb 'lubada' has multiple related meanings. It can mean 'to promise' when making a commitment to someone, or it can mean 'to allow/permit' when giving permission for something to happen. The word form changes depending on the subject and tense - for example, 'ma luban' (I promise/allow), 'ta ei luba' (he/she doesn't allow), 'meie lubame' (we promise/allow).
